thread.section_title: W New York - Union Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best value in NYC
thread.title_full: Best value in NYC - Review of W New York - Union Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Swil245
title: Best value in NYC
text:
Excellently located hotel with all that you need for a stay in NYC. The hotel is out of the rat race of Time Square and surrounds, and close to excellent cafes, restaurants and bars.
Rooms are large by NYC standards. The bathroom whilst renovated is a little 'old style' - basin and shower over bath.
Check-in and out was efficient and friendly
